headline: Should You Rethink Franklin Resources After Its 7% Slide This Week?
summary: Wondering if Franklin Resources is a smart value pick right now? You are not alone, as many investors are re-examining this long-running financial stock’s appeal. The share price has moved down 7% in the past week and is lower by 5.3% over the last month. However, it remains up 6.5% year-to-date and 22% over five years, giving a complex picture of performance and sentiment shifts. Recent market buzz has focused on Franklin Resources’ ongoing efforts to diversify its product lineup and expand...
